thread.title: BRIEF-Churchill Downs Inc Announces Entry Into Real Money Online Gaming And Sports Betting Markets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Churchill Downs Inc Announces Entry Into Real Money Online Gaming And Sports Betting Markets
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Churchill Downs Inc:
* CHURCHILL DOWNS INCORPORATED ANNOUNCES ENTRY INTO REAL MONEY ONLINE GAMING AND SPORTS BETTING MARKETS
* CHURCHILL DOWNS INC - DEAL WITH SBTECH TO UTILIZE INTEGRATED TECHNOLOGY PLATFORM FOR CDIâ€™S IGAMING & SPORTS BETTING OPERATIONS
* CHURCHILL DOWNS INC - STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP WITH SBTECH INITIALLY IS INTENDED TO ENABLE CDI TO ENTER NEW JERSEY AND PENNSYLVANIA
* CHURCHILL DOWNS INC - PARTNERSHIP WILL ENABLE CDI TO ENTER MISSISSIPPI FOR SPORTS WAGERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
